text: Our point of difference, aside from the

amazing content we
produce and the kind of experience
we bring on site, is we want to have the

best, most reliable,
accurate scoring data you can

have anywhere for PGA
TOUR events across all our tours.
A big change we want to deliver as part

of our rebuild over the
last 12 months was we wanted
to take scoring away from a polling

as in updates every 30 seconds
to push that scoring to you

the minute we got the data.
AppSync allowed us

to implement basically
one to many messaging,

whether it's my phone, your
phone, your grandma's website,

they all get the score update
at exactly the same time.

You get a feel for the
immediacy of what's going on,
on course, wherever you are.
Another advantage of using AppSync

is the GraphQL aspect allows
us to customize the payloads
by the platforms requesting them.
So that means the traffic we send you is
optimized for the device you're on.
I think the power of AWS is
it doesn't tell you how to do things.
It gives you a toolbox to pick from.
And that's how I would phrase

what we've been given is a
toolbox that we have access to,
to build the best thing for us

because we're different
from everybody else.
We have an event every week.
We are pushing new features every week,

and that's a really exciting
difference for us from
where we were 24 months ago.
